background_description: A sandy beach environment with scattered small pebbles and shells along the waterline. The water is shallow, murky, and light brown-grey, gently lapping at the shore. Another seal is visible in the blurry background lying on the sand.
explanation: The image clearly displays a Seal partially submerged in shallow water and resting on a sandy beach. Its distinct spotted grey fur, pronounced shape, and visible features make it stand out clearly against the muted tones of the sand and water, confirming the absence of camouflage.
